content: धृत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [धृ-कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Held, carried, borne, supported. {@--2@} Possessed. {@--3@} Kept, preserved, retained. {@--4@} Seized, grasped, laid hold of. {@--5@} Worn, used, put on; <ls>Ku. 5. 44.</ls> {@--6@} Placed, deposited. {@--7@} Practised, observed. {@--8@} Weighed. {@--9@} (Actively used) Holding, bearing. {@--10@} Intent upon. {@--11@} Prepared ready. See धृ also. --तं {@--1@} Falling. {@--2@} State, existence. {@--3@} Taking, seizing. {@--4@} Wearing, putting on. {@--5@} A particular manner of fighting.
